name: Kevin M. Neal
body:
### Brief Bio
I am a PhD candidate in the Shaffer Lab at UCLA in the Department of Ecology and Evolutionary Biology. My interests lie in evolutionary biology, specifically in conducting population and landscape genetic analyses of amphibians with application to conservation. I am also interested in coding in R, and I am beginning to get my toes wet in Julia and Python.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
